name: openproject
description: OpenProject is an open-source project management platform supporting agile boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, and team collaboration. It can be self-hosted or run as SaaS, serving as an enterprise-grade alternative to Jira.
features: Agile boards: Manage sprints and backlogs with Scrum and Kanban views for iterative development workflows.
Gantt charts: Visualize project timelines with dependencies, milestones, and critical path analysis for planning.
Time tracking: Log hours spent on tasks and generate reports for billing, capacity planning, and productivity analysis.
Team collaboration: Share documents, comment on work packages, and mention team members for coordinated project execution.
Custom workflows: Define status transitions and approval processes tailored to your organization's project methodology.
Resource management: Assign team members to tasks and track workload distribution across projects and departments.
Budget tracking: Monitor project costs against estimates with expense logging and financial reporting capabilities.
API integration: Connect with external tools and automate workflows using REST API for custom business processes.
